content:
3 VERIFICATION PROCESS

3.1 Method and Criteria

The overall verification, from Contract Review to Verification Report & Opinion, was conducted using Bureau Veritas Certification internal procedures.

The Project was verified against the requirements set in VCS Standard Version 3.3 effective as the 01/05/2012"! and the Clean Development Mechanism Validation and Verification Standard version 02.0 issued by CDM Executive Board at its 65" meeting on 25/11/2011.
